title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove
OB: When I perform the 'Update Test Suite' action, it is not clear that if I only select 'Y' in the dialog, 'X' will be removed from the test suite.
EB: The 'Update Test Suite' action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in the removal of 'X' from the test suite.
SR: Improve the 'Update Test Suite' action to provide a warning or confirmation to the user before removing 'X' from the test suite.
